site.name: Ryan Warner
site.copyright:
Designed and developed by Ryan Warner. 
Built with Gatsby. Hosted on Firebase. Type set in Jost*.

hero.title: I'm Ryan, software engineer and interface designer.
hero.subtitle: I specialize in rapidly prototyping software companies and web applications. I talk about my journey on Twitter, commit code to Github, and take shots on Dribbble.

project.title: progetto 01
project.body: An online coworking community for indie hackers, entreprenuers, and founders. Chat live with app developers, designers, and mentors. Access video courses and tutorials.
